message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product at a special price. I believe it's a great opportunity for you to acquire something that's truly valuable to you. I'm willing to let it go for $9,500.

Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate you being willing to negotiate. I'm interested in the product, but I'm only comfortable paying $8,500 at this time. This would still give you a good profit, and it's the highest I can go right now.

Thanks for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I was hoping to get a bit closer to the value you place on the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll counter with $9,000. I think this is a fair price considering the value you'll get from the product.
